name: ld2h
description: Expand tags by rendering local or remote RDF resources, recursively.

scripts.prepublish: mkdir -p dist && browserify src/ld2h.js  -d --external rdf-ext --external rdf2h --external es6-promise --ignore rdf-serializer-jsonld --ignore rdf-serializer-n3 --ignore rdf-serializer-ntriples --ignore rdf-serializer-sparql-update --ignore rdf-parser-jsonld | exorcist dist/ld2h.js.map > dist/ld2h.js
scripts.test-es5-compile: mkdir -p test-generated-es5 && babel --source-maps inline test/test.js --out-file test-generated-es5/test-es5.js
scripts.test-browserify: npm run test-es5-compile && browserify test-generated-es5/test-es5.js > test-generated-es5/test-browser.js
